content:
Diagnosis:	Locally advanced pancreatic ductal adenocarcinoma with liver metastases, HER2 amplified

Management:	2024-01-15 Started on FOLFIRINOX
		2024-02-20 Changed to Trastuzumab/Pertuzumab with modified FOLFOX due to HER2 amplification

Current Situation:	Pre-cycle 4 Trastuzumab/Pertuzumab with mFOLFOX

I reviewed [redacted name] today prior to cycle 4 of treatment. CT performed on 15/4/24 shows stable disease in both pancreatic primary and liver metastases, with no new sites of disease. Performance status remains 1. Main issues are grade 2 peripheral neuropathy affecting fingers and toes, and intermittent diarrhea managed with loperamide. Blood tests show stable liver function and CA19-9 has decreased from 1200 to 450.

Plan to continue with cycle 4 today at current doses. Will arrange repeat CT after cycle 6 and review in 3 weeks with blood tests. Have prescribed additional antiemetics and provided guidance on managing diarrhea.
